name: Azibhania
startIntroPart1: It has been revealed that this land has many valuable resources to the empire, and that there might be enemies of the hiding here. Commander, you are to investigate, claim the resources for the empire and, if enemies are to be found, destroy them.
startIntroPart2: Do not fail me, General. You have been chosen personally to lead an occupation of this planet, and I will be overseeing your progress. Failure will not be tolerated.
declaringWar: Your lack of foresight will be your demise.
attacked: I will show you the power of the Dark Side.
hateHello: I am surprised you still live.
tradeRequest: It would not be wise to enrage my master.
uniques: May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[+25]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
Pastures yield additional 1 Food and 1 Culture. Earn [150]% of [Land] opponent's [Strength] as [Gold] for kills

name: Chediluen
startIntroPart1: Greetings. It seems the force has brought us together. I hear you got to survey and establish a base in this planet. I too have heard of there being suspicious activity here so I'm trying to supervise myself. Might as well set up a base since we're here anyway.
startIntroPart2: Danger is always around the corner though, so make sure to be careful. Good luck, and may the force be with you.
declaringWar: You're leaving behind a trail of chaos and destruction, I will have to stop you.
defeated: No way, and I was just getting started...
introduction: Ever been out of a job? I can teach you moisture farming.
hateHello: I can feel the conflict within you.
afterPeace: It's never too late, not even for you.
tradeRequest: It seems the force has brought us together.
uniques: [-50]% Food consumption by specialists [in all cities]
[+33]% Production when constructing [Fighter] units [in all cities]
[+33]% Production when constructing [Bomber] units [in all cities]
May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[-25]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
Pay only one third the usual cost for naval unit maintenance
Receive 10% bonus toward correspondent Great Person when you build an unique specialist building in your Empire for the first time

name: Divinestria
startIntroPart1: Hailing from Divinestria, O' wonderful leader. One of the royal noble Pureheart council.
startIntroPart2: Ilumara, lead the nationn for Divinestria.
declaringWar: It appears there are many who want you dead, and so you will be.
defeated: Fool! At least with me the underworld was under control, but soon one worse than me shall rise.
introduction: If there's money to be made, we will get it.
neutralHello: Come to me with a deal?
neutralNo: I could have you hung for that.
neutralYes: You know how to do business
hateHello: I can feel the conflict within you.
hateNo: I could have you hung for that.
hateYes: You know how to do business.
afterPeace: This is not peace, but a pause
tradeRequest: My latest batch of shipments has arrived.
uniques: [+10]% Strength <when fighting units from a Civilization with more Cities than you>
May choose [2] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion
[+25]% Production when constructing [All] buildings [in all cities]
"Borrows" city names from other civilizations in the game
No movement cost to pillage <for [Melee] units>
+10% Strength when fighting City-State units and cities
Receive triple Gold from pillaging Cities
When defeating a [{Barbarian} {Water}] unit, earn [30] Gold and recruit it <with [100]% chance>
When conquering an encampment, earn [30] Gold and recruit a Barbarian unit <with [100]% chance>
When defeating a [{Enemy} {Water}] unit, recruit it <with [100]% chance>

name: Colziand
startIntroPart1: Oh Raymond! You who formed a nation of people for God to saved, glorious you are. Thanks be to the mighty Father.
startIntroPart2: Will you once more rule the world for the Lord's desire.
attacked: I'm dissapointed! Why declare destruction, is there no fun in peace and prosperity?
defeated: Colziand is its people, me, and Him.
introduction: Kumusta sa'inyo. O estranghero, saan ka galing?
hateHello: You speak in pride, I don't wanna hear it
tradeRequest: It appears that you have a golden interest of our goods
uniques: [+5 Science, +5 Food, +5 Gold, +5 Production, +5 Culture, +5 Faith, +5 Happiness] from [All] tiles [in all cities]

name: Salumi
startIntroPart1: Be welcomed, princesses. You lead the beatiful and joyful nation of Salumi, a country filled more women than men with great cultural and bio diversity. ...One, two, three! Three had been the attempts to break free - getting terribly punished - but with determination, Salumi emerged to a great nation. Since the start we had a ton of great political division, which brought many problems and conflicts, but despite all the troubles, Salumi ought to help other no matter what. The conflicts didn't cease until early 21st century, where the sun finally rises over Salumi to achieve greatness.
startIntroPart2: Princesses, your people want you to lead them to greatness. They want you to convert them in to the best nation. Will you answer the call? Can you fight and triump over the adversities? Can you build a civilization that can stand the pass of time?
declaringWar: Prepare to lose your empire of opression!
attacked: You will see how fruitless this will be for you. Wait and see.
defeated: I hope you treat my people good, donÂ´t take away their happiness.
introduction: Greetings! This is Salumi, our wordeful land. Want a kiss?
tradeRequest: I  thought you might be intested in this...
uniques: Receive a free Social Policy when you advance to the next era

name: Dublin
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?

name: Edinburgh
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!

name: Suzainswellia
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.

name: Fullysian
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We were too weak to protect ourselves...

name: Arxemlio
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!
